translations.chinese: 殷畔楚，以舒屠六，舉九江兵迎黥布，並行屠城父，隨劉賈皆會。
translations.english: Yin rebelled against Chu, massacred Liuchu with Ying Bu, raised the Jiujiang troops to welcome Ying Bu, and together marched to massacre Chengfu, following Liu Jia to all assemble.
In the twelfth month, they surrounded Xiang Yu at Gaixia.

translations.chinese: 羽夜聞漢軍四面皆楚歌，知盡得楚地，羽與數百騎走，是以兵大敗。
translations.english: Xiang Yu at night heard that Han troops on all four sides were singing Chu songs, knew they had taken all Chu territory, and Xiang Yu fled with several hundred cavalry, which is why his army suffered a great defeat.
Guan Ying pursued and beheaded Xiang Yu at Dongcheng.
Chu territory was completely pacified, only Lu did not submit.
